original_text: People who turn away from God are like that. They have no family to live after them. If they use the money from bribes to build their homes, fire will destroy those homes. People who turn away from God are like that.
korean_text: 경건하지 못한 무리는 자식을 낳지 못할 것이며 뇌물을 받는 자의 장막은 불탈 것이라

sentences.original_text: People who turn away from God are like that.
They have no family to live after them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들 후에 살아갈 가족이 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: If they use the money from bribes
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 뇌물에서 나온 돈을 사용한다면

sentences.original_text: People who turn away from God are like that.
